questions.name: How would you rate yourself for each of these skills? (1 = lowest, 5 = highest)
rows: I know my study triggers and put these in place to help me get started.
I know the type of light/noise/room etc. that helps me to study well.
I am good at asking myself 'Why am I doing this?' and finding a motivation so that I don't procrastinate.
I know my 'danger zones' or biggest distractions and remove them as much as possible when I'm studying.
I carefully divide my time into manageable chunks when I'm studying and schedule regular breaks.
I know the types of activities that I feel most motivated carrying out as part of a group.
I identify and challenge any emotion that is causing me to procrastinate.
I identify the first small task that I can easily achieve if there is a task I am procrastinating over.
I am good at setting myself realistic and timely deadlines.
I am good at taking time to reward myself when I have finished an unappealing task.
